Whisk Chicago 
In Brief: If you want to get an idea of what Chicago burgers taste like beyond the usual suspects , you'll want to head to RedEye â€™s third annual Battle of the Burger . This year's competition is tougher than ever, as it started out with 100 bars and restaurants from all across Chicagoland. They've now been narrowed down to 20, with participating venues including the likes of Assembly American Bar & Cafe , Bad Apple , Davanti Enoteca , Good Stuff Eatery , Leadbelly , Lottie's Pub and Whisk . 
Food Network star Jeff Mauro ("The Sandwich King") headlines the festivities as host and a guest judge alongside the public. Each general admission ticket will include burger tastings and complimentary beer. For those who purchase a VIP ticket, the admission will include tastings and beer, plus a meet-and-greet session with Jeff Mauro. VIP ticket holders will also gain early entrance at 5:30 p.m. 
I have a pair of VIP tickets (worth $120) for one lucky person. What's the most outrageous topping you've ever put on a burger--that's edible of course! Follow me on Twitter and give it your best shot by tweeting at me. Speaking of which, photos are highly encouraged. The winner will be chosen on Tuesday, July 21 and tickets are non-transferable. 
You must be at least 21 years old to attend this event. 
When: 6:30-9:30 p.m. July 23 
How Much: General admission ($40); VIP admission ($60) 
You can also get $5 off when you use special code "REDEYE5A" at Battle of the Burger.
